00014 -(id)initWithQuery:(UIQuery *)_query {

00016                 self.query = _query;

00020 
00021 -(UIExpectation *)not {
00022         isNot = YES;
00023         return self;
00024 }
00025 
00026 -(BOOL)exist {
00027         return [self exist:@""];
00028 }
00029 
00030 -(BOOL)exist:(NSString *)appendToFailureMessage {
00031         if ((([query views].count > 0) && isNot) || (([query views].count == 0) && !isNot)) {
00032                 [NSException raise:nil format:@"%@ should %@ %@", [query className], (isNot ? @"not exist" : @"exist"), appendToFailureMessage];
00033         }
00034         return YES;
00035 }
00036 
00037 -(UIExpectation *)have {
00038         isHave = YES;
00039         return self;
00040 }
00041 
00042 -(void)have:(BOOL)condition {
00043         if ((!condition && !isNot) || (condition && isNot)) {
00044                 [NSException raise:nil format:@"%@ did not pass condition: [%@ have:YES]", [[query view] class], (isNot ? @"should.not" : @"should")];
00045         }
00046 }
00047 
00048 - (NSMethodSignature *)methodSignatureForSelector:(SEL)aSelector {
00049         if (!isHave) return [super methodSignatureForSelector:aSelector];
00050         if (isNot) {
00051                 [NSException raise:nil format:@".not isn't supported yet for something like [should.not.have blah:1]"];
00052         }
00053         NSString *selector = NSStringFromSelector(aSelector);
00054         NSRange whereIsSet = [selector rangeOfString:@":"];
00055         if (whereIsSet.length != 0) {
00056                 return [NSMethodSignature signatureWithObjCTypes:"@@:@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@@"];
00057         } 
00058         else {
00059                 return [super methodSignatureForSelector:aSelector];
00060         }
00061 }
00062 
00063 - (void)forwardInvocation:(NSInvocation *)anInvocation {
00064         NSMutableString *selector = [NSMutableString stringWithString:NSStringFromSelector([anInvocation selector])];
00065         NSArray *selectors = [selector componentsSeparatedByString:@":"];
00066         NSMutableString *errorMessage = [NSMutableString string];
00067         BOOL foundErrors = NO;
00068         for (UIView *view in [query targetViews]) {
00069                 NSMutableArray *errors = [NSMutableArray array];
00070                 int i = 2;
00071                 id value = nil;
00072                 for (NSString *key in selectors) {
00073                         if (![key isEqualToString:@""]) {
00074                                 SEL selector = NSSelectorFromString(key);
00075                                 if (![view respondsToSelector:selector]) {
00076                                         [errors addObject:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ doesn't respond to %@", [view class], key]];
00077                                         foundErrors = YES;
00078                                         continue;
00079                                 }
00080                                 [anInvocation getArgument:&value atIndex:i];
00081                                 NSString *returnType = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%s", [[view methodSignatureForSelector:selector] methodReturnType]];
00082                                 if ([returnType isEqualToString:@"@"]) {
00083                                         if ([value isKindOfClass:[NSString class]]) {
00084                                                 if ([[view performSelector:selector] rangeOfString:value].length == 0) {
00085                                                         [errors addObject:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ : \"%@\" doesn't contain \"%@\"", key, [view performSelector:selector], value]];
00086                                                         foundErrors = YES;
00087                                                         continue;
00088                                                 }
00089                                         } else if (![[view performSelector:selector] isEqual:value]) {
00090                                                 [errors addObject:[NSString      stringWithFormat:@"%@ : %@ is not equal to %@", key, [view performSelector:selector], value]];
00091                                                 foundErrors = YES;
00092                                                 continue;
00093                                         }
00094                                 } else {
00095                                         if ([view performSelector:selector] != value) {
00096                                                 [errors addObject:[NSString      stringWithFormat:@"%@ is not equal to value", key]];
00097                                                 foundErrors = YES;
00098                                                 continue;
00099                                         }
00100                                 }
00101                         }
00102                 }
00103                 if (foundErrors) {
00104                         [errorMessage appendFormat:@"%@ should have %@ but %@\n", [view class], selector, errors];
00105                 }
00106         }
00107         if (foundErrors) {
00108                 [NSException raise:nil format:errorMessage];
00109         }
00110 }
